title: Best site for patch notes
body:
Hey guys.

Just wondering if there is a good site for patch notes, Changes etc.

ive used http://jiyungslantern.com/ 

But its not up to date allot of the time.

replies.body: Surrender@20 if you want sneak peeks, or just use you know, the official site.
Yea been looking around it. Very busy and clustered design but good content !!

I just want the info without the crap , I thought there must be a site that people use that I don't know about. 

where the patch info is put into a easily readable format.

> [{quoted}](name=vicelore,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bjRNORAf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-21T04:08:31.806+0000)
>
> I just want the info without the crap , I thought there must be a site that people use that I don't know about. 
> 
> where the patch info is put into a easily readable format.

LoLwiki also has a database for patch notes dunno if you will like it though.
